name: Mediterranean Chicken with Eggplant
author: thepamperedchefny
summary: I've learned to make this dish from my grandmother who still lives on the shore of the Mediterranean.
ingredients: 3  eggplants, peeled and cut lengthwise into 1/2 inch thick slices
6  skinless, boneless chicken breast halves - diced
directions: Place eggplant strips in a big pot of lightly salted water and soak for 30 minutes (this will improve the taste; they will leave a brown color in the pot)
Remove eggplant from pot and brush lightly with olive oil
Saute or grill until lightly browned and place in a 9x13 inch baking dish
Saute diced chicken and onion in a large skillet over medium heat
Stir in tomato paste and water, cover skillet, reduce heat to low and simmer for 10 minutes
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C)
Season with oregano, salt and pepper and cover with aluminum foil
Bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes
